formatted_address: 150 South Bridge Rd, B1-08 Fook Hai Building, Singapore 058727
name: HORO Singapore

reviews.text: If you're looking for a place to let loose and have an unforgettable night with friends, this KTV pub is the spot! The vibe is electric—great music, amazing sound systems, and a huge selection of songs that covers all your favorites. The sofa are top-notch, super comfy. Plus, the drinks are on point, and the food? Definitely not your average pub fare; it's delicious! The boss is super friendly and makes you feel right at home, and he goes above and beyond to keep the fun rolling. Highly recommend this place for a fun night out—whether you're a serious singer or just want to have a good time with some laughs, this is the spot! :)

Exceptional service! The boss Kelvin was friendly and attentive and made sure we had everything we needed l. The atmosphere was lively with creative title of zodiac on each table with good audio sounds system with small performance stage . Perfect for catching up with friends. Highly recommend!
Very lovely place to hang out with friends. Reasonable prices. Bosses are nice, love their service. Definitely will go back again.

Cozy karaoke pub, clean and cozy ambience with Martell only at $208! Sound system is really good and hence effortless singing for me. Boss Leo is friendly and fun to hangout with. 12 beer towers for only $555 and get to keep the gold token to keep track as your beer balance!

Aesthetically pleasing, cozy and unique theme. Atmosphere and people are great, warm and friendly! Singing here is enjoyable with a high-end sound system, with added flair of a podium for a mini concert experience.

vicinity: 150 South Bridge Road, B1-08 Fook Hai Building
